course.title: CSI 4106 Introduction to Artificial Intelligence (3 units)
course.desc: The roots and scope of Artificial Intelligence. Knowledge and knowledge representation. Search, informed search, adversarial search. Deduction and reasoning. Uncertainty in Artificial Intelligence. Introduction to Natural Language Processing. Elements of planning. Basics of Machine Learning.Course Component: LecturePrerequisites: MAT 1348, (CSI 3120 or SEG 2106).
